backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko canister actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented photography site features to corresponding source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short summaries of all frontend source files for build and documentation purposes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with extensive OKLCH variable definitions for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, fonts, and mounting root for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component assembling navigation, all site sections, and the footer.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with brand info, navigation shortcuts, contact details, and social links.
frontend/src/components/LightboxModal.ts: Lightbox modal component for displaying enlarged portfolio images using shadcn dialog.
frontend/src/components/NavBar.tsx: Responsive navbar with scroll-to-section behavior, mobile menu, and style changes on scroll.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders an About section with studio description, highlight cards, and a grid of specialties.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Implements a contact form with validation, submission handling, and a success message state.
frontend/src/components/sections/HomeSec: Provides the hero section with background image, headline, and buttons that scroll to portfolio or contact sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/Package: Displays photography package details using an accordion, including coverage, deliverables, turnaround, and add-ons.
frontend/src/components/sections/Portfol: Shows a filterable portfolio grid with category buttons and a lightbox modal for viewing images.
frontend/src/components/sections/Pricing: Lists pricing tiers in cards with features and a button that scrolls to the contact section.
frontend/src/content/packages.ts: Defines package details and exports an array of photography packages with pricing, deliverables, and terms.
frontend/src/content/portfolio.ts: Defines portfolio categories, item type, and a list of 12 sample portfolio entries with image paths and titles.
frontend/src/content/pricing.ts: Defines pricing tier structure and three tiers with descriptions, prices, and inclusion lists.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInquiryForm.ts: Implements local inquiry form state, validation, submission simulation via sessionStorage, and reset logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, managing auth client creation, login, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/styles defining color variables, typography, dark mode, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, and image specifications for the photography website.
